titleStmt.title: A discourse of infallibility with Mr. Thomas White's answer to it, and a reply to him / by Sir Lucius Cary late Lord Viscount of Falkland ; also Mr. Walter Mountague (Abbot of Nanteul) his letter against Protestantism and his Lordship's answer thereunto, with Mr. John Pearson's preface.
titleStmt.author: Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
Pearson, John, 1613-1686.
Chillingworth, William, 1602-1644.
Montagu, Walter, 1603?-1677.
Triplett, Thomas, 1602 or 3-1670.
White, Thomas, 1593-1676. Answer to the Lord Faulklands discourse of infallibility.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, to which are now added two discourses of Episcopacy /

notesStmt.note: Edited by Thomas Triplet. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
